title: Italy election: Anti-establishment surge means gridlock
text:
Italy election: Anti-establishment surge means gridlock 3:56pm IST - 01:33 
Italy faces a prolonged period of instability after voters delivered a hung parliament in Sunday's election, spurning the traditional political parties in favor of anti-establishment and far-right groups in record numbers. Matthew Larotonda reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Italy faces a prolonged period of instability after voters delivered a hung parliament in Sunday's election, spurning the traditional political parties in favor of anti-establishment and far-right groups in record numbers.
